## Files.writeJsonFileSync() function

Convenience function to write type-safe JSON to a file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function writeJsonFileSync(srcPath: string, value: JsonValue): Result<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  srcPath | string | Path of the file to write. |
|  value | [JsonValue](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md) | The [JsonValue](./ts-json.jsonvalue.md) to be written. |

**Returns:**

Result&lt;boolean&gt;
